actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +2 to hit to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is prone, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

name: Vampiric Mist
habitat: Arctic, coastal, forest, grassland, mountain, swamp, underdark, urban
immunity: poison, charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Life Sense
traits.text: The mist can sense the location of any creature within 60 feet of it, unless that creature's type is Construct or Undead.

traits.name: Forbiddance
traits.text: The mist can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

traits.name: Misty Form
traits.text: The mist can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can pass through it without squeezing. Each foot of movement in water costs it 2 extra feet, rather than 1 extra foot. The mist can't manipulate objects in any way that requires fingers or manual dexterity.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.text: The mist takes 10 radiant damage whenever it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, the mist has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.text: The mist touches one creature in its space. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw (Undead and Constructs automatically succeed), or it takes 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage, the mist regains 10 hit points, and the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception skill) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Splash
traits.text: When the troll takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the troll takes 9 (2d8) poison damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage, and the creature is poisoned until the start of the troll's next turn.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Venom Spray (Recharge)
actions.text: The troll slices itself with a claw, releasing a spray of poison in a 15-foot cube. The troll takes 7 (2d6) slashing damage (this damage can't be reduced in any way). Each creature in the area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The wastrilith can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Corrupt Water
traits.text:
At the start of each of the wastrilith's turns, exposed water within 30 feet of it is befouled. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away. Water in containers remains corrupted until it evaporates.
A creature that consumes this foul water or swims in it must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to the foul water for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of this time, the poisoned creature must repeat the saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 18 (4d8) poison damage and is poisoned until it finishes a long rest.
If another demon drinks the foul water as an action, it gains 11 (2d10) temporary hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The wastrilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undertow
traits.text: As a bonus action when the wastrilith is underwater, it can cause all water within 60 feet of it to be difficult terrain for other creatures until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wastrilith uses Grasping Spout and makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Grasping Spout
actions.text: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. On a failed save, it takes 22 (4d8 + 4) acid damage and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't pulled.

name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
languages: Aquan, one language of its creator's choice

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

actions.name: Trident
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Freezing Strikes (Recharge)
actions.text: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) cold damage. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

resistance.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.text: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

reactions.name: Vicious Reprisal
reactions.text: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Fey Step (Recharge 4-6)
traits.text: As a bonus action, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The eladrin has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sorrowful Presence
traits.text:
Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is charmed for 1 minute. While charmed in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the charmed creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) slashing damage, or 5 (1d10) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Frigid Rebuke
reactions.text: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or take 11 (2d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The yagnoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The yagnoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The yagnoloth makes one massive arm attack and one electrified touch attack, or it makes one massive arm attack and teleports before or after the attack.

actions.name: Electrified Touch
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 27 (6d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Massive Arm
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 23 (3d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or is stunned until the end of the yagnoloth's next turn.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.text: The yagnoloth touches one incapacitated creature within 15 feet of it. The target takes 36 (7d8 + 4) necrotic damage, and the yagnoloth gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest, and the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Battlefield Cunning (Recharge 4-6)
actions.text: Up to two allied yugoloths within 60 feet of the yagnoloth that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: The yagnoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

name: Yeenoghu
immunity: poison, {'immune': ['bludgeoning', 'piercing', 'slashing'], 'note': 'that is nonmagical', 'cond': True}, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Yeenoghu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Yeenoghu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Yeenoghu's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.text: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text:
Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause it to create an additional effect of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multiattack):
1. The attack deals an extra 13 (2d12) bludgeoning damage.
2. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.
3. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by the confusion spell until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.

actions.name: Flail
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 15 (1d12 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (1d10 + 9) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.text:
Legendary Action Uses: 3. Immediately after another creature's turn, The Yeenoghu can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The creature regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Charge. Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.

Swat Away. Yeenoghu makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 24 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.

Savage (Costs 2 Actions). Yeenoghu makes a bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception skill) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Stab
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

name: Zaratan
habitat: Desert, forest, grassland, hill, mountain, underdark
immunity: poison, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned

traits.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
traits.text:
As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is concentration must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken.
The shock wave deals 100 thunder damage to all structures in contact with the ground in the area. If a creature is near a structure that collapses, the creature might be buried; a creature within half the distance of the structure's height must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 (5d6) bludgeoning damage, is knocked prone, and is trapped in the rubble. A trapped creature is restrained, requiring a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics skill) check as an action to escape. Another creature within 5 feet of the buried creature can use its action to clear rubble and grant advantage on the check. If three creatures use their actions in this way, the check is an automatic success. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall prone or become trapped.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The zaratan's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The Elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The zaratan makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stomp.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stomp
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 26 (3d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spit Rock
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +17 to hit to hit, range 120/240 ft., one target. 31 (6d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spew Debris (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked prone.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.text:
Legendary Action Uses: 3. Immediately after another creature's turn, The Zaratan can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The creature regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Stomp. The zaratan makes one stomp attack.

Move. The zaratan moves up to its speed.

Spit (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan uses Spit Rock.

Retract (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is restrained. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.

Revitalize (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains 52 (5d20) hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.

Emerge (Costs 2 Actions). The zaratan emerges from its shell and uses Spit Rock. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.

name: Zariel

resistance.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

immunity: necrotic, poison, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Zariel's weapon attacks are magical. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 (8d8) fire damage (included in the weapon attacks below).

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Zariel attacks twice with her longsword or with her javelins. She can substitute Horrid Touch for one of these attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +16 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage, or 19 (2d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +16 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Horrid Touch (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also blinded and deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.text:
Legendary Action Uses: 3. Immediately after another creature's turn, The Zariel can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The creature regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Immolating Gaze (Costs 2 Actions). Zariel turns her magical gaze toward one creature she can see within 120 feet of her and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) fire damage.

Teleport. Zariel uses her Teleport action.

name: Zuggtmoy
immunity: poison, {'immune': ['bludgeoning', 'piercing', 'slashing'], 'note': 'that is nonmagical', 'cond': True}, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, poisoned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Zuggtmoy's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Zuggtmoy makes three pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Infestation Spores (3/Day)
actions.text: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

actions.name: Mind Control Spores (Recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Humanoids and Beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected in this way, the creature is charmed by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

reactions.name: Protective Thrall
reactions.text: When Zuggtmoy is hit by an attack, one creature within 5 feet of Zuggtmoy that is charmed by her must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

legendary_actions.name: Legendary Actions
legendary_actions.text:
Legendary Action Uses: 3. Immediately after another creature's turn, The Zuggtmoy can expend a use to take one of the following actions. The creature regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns.

Attack. Zuggtmoy makes one pseudopod attack.

Exert Will. One creature charmed by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as she directs or to make a weapon attack against a target that she designates.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The Dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +13 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

actions.name: Time Breath (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The Dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 60-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 36 (8d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage, and it has the poisoned condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself after it succeeds on three of these saves.

reactions.name: Reactive Rend
reactions.text: After using Legendary Resistance or in response to being hit by an attack roll, the Dragon makes one Rend attack.

reactions.name: Slow Time
reactions.text: Immediately after a creature the Dragon can see ends its turn, the Dragon targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself that is weakened by its Time Breath. Until the weakened effect ends on the target, its speed becomes 0, and its speed can't increase.

reactions.name: Time Slip
reactions.text: The Dragon halves the damage it takes from an attack made against it, provided it can see the attacker. The Dragon can then immediately teleport, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Cycle of Rebirth
traits.text: If the Dragon dies, its soul coalesces into a steely egg and teleports to a random plane of existence. The egg is immune to all damage and hatches into a time Dragon wyrmling after 1d100 years. The Dragon retains all memories and knowledge it gained in its previous life.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.text: If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The Dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +17 to hit to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 22 (3d8 + 9) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage.

actions.name: Time Breath (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The Dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 90-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage, it has the poisoned condition, and other creatures have resistance to all damage it deals. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself after it succeeds on three of these saves.

actions.name: Time Gate (1/Day)
actions.text: The Dragon conjures a 20-foot-diameter, circular portal in the space between its horns or in an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself. The portal links to a precise location on any plane of existence at a point in time up to 8,000 years from the present, whether past or future. The portal lasts for 24 hours or until the Dragon's concentration ends (as if concentration on a spell). The portal has a front and a back on each plane where it appears. Travel through the portal is possible only by moving through its front. Anything that does so is transported to the destination, appearing in the unoccupied space nearest to the portal. Deities and other planar rulers can prevent portals created by the Dragon from opening in the rulers' presence or anywhere within their domains.

reactions.name: Reactive Rend
reactions.text: After using Legendary Resistance or in response to being hit by an attack roll, the Dragon makes one Rend attack.

reactions.name: Slow Time
reactions.text: Immediately after a creature the Dragon can see ends its turn, the Dragon targets a creature it can see within 90 feet of itself that is weakened by its Time Breath. Until the weakened effect ends on the target, its speed becomes 0, and its speed can't increase.

reactions.name: Time Slip
reactions.text: The Dragon halves the damage it takes from an attack made against it, provided it can see the attacker. The Dragon can then immediately teleport, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Avoidance
traits.text: If the null is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take half as much damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and half as much damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The null makes two Force Dagger attacks.

actions.name: Force Dagger
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) force damage. The dagger magically returns to the null's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

bonus_actions.name: Defier's Whim
bonus_actions.text: The null takes the Dash, Disengage, or Use an Object action.

reactions.name: Nullify Spell (3/Day)
reactions.text: The null utters a magical word of cancellation to interrupt a creature it can see that is casting a spell. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the spell is 4th level or higher, the null makes an Intelligence check (DC 10 + the spell's level). On a successful check, the spell fails and has no effect.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The aurumach makes three Manifested Blade or Gleaming Ray attacks.

actions.name: Manifested Blade
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (4d8 + 5) force damage.

actions.name: Gleaming Ray
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +11 to hit to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 24 (3d12 + 5) force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The aurumach casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19):
At will: detect magic, detect thoughts
1/day: fly, geas (as an action), slow, suggestion

bonus_actions.name: Aura of Blades
bonus_actions.text: The aurumach manifests a spectral, golden aura of blades around itself. While this aura is manifested, each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the aurumach must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The aura disappears after 1 minute, when the aurumach has the incapacitated condition or dies, or when the aurumach uses a bonus action to end it.

bonus_actions.name: Invoke Weakness (Recharge 5)
bonus_actions.text: The aurumach attempts to use its magic to weaken the defenses of a creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become cursed until the end of the aurumach's next turn. The next time the aurumach hits the cursed target with a Manifested Blade or Gleaming Ray attack, the target takes an extra 27 (6d8) force damage.

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.text: If the avoral is flying, dives at least 30 feet in a straight line toward a Medium or smaller creature, and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or take 14 (4d6) piercing damage and have the prone condition.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The avoral doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The avoral makes two Talon attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Talon
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The avoral casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
1/day: command, hold person

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.text: If the baernaloth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The baernaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The baernaloth makes one Anguishing Bite attack and one Claw attack. It can also use Teleport.

actions.name: Anguishing Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the baernaloth's next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Miasma of Discord (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The baernaloth exhales gray vapors that coalesce at a point it can see within 120 feet of itself. The vapors fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point, then vanish. Each non-yugoloth creature in that area must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 35 (10d6) psychic damage and has the charmed condition until the end of its next turn. A creature charmed in this way treats its allies as foes, and the colors of its body and equipment become shades of gray. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Summon Yugoloth (1/Day)
actions.text: The baernaloth has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 mezzoloths, 1 arcanaloth, or 1 baernaloth (the mezzoloth and arcanaloth appear in the Monster Manual). A summoned yugoloth appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the baernaloth, acts as an ally of the baernaloth, and can't summon other yugoloths. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the baernaloth dies, or until the baernaloth dismisses it as an action.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: The baernaloth teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The baernaloth casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
At will: detect thoughts, phantasmal force, suggestion
1/day: cloudkill, plane shift (self only), scrying (as an action)

reactions.name: Afflict Despair
reactions.text: When a creature that the baernaloth can see within 60 feet of itself hits with an attack roll or succeeds on a saving throw, the baernaloth forces the creature to reroll the d20 and use the new result.

reactions.name: Inescapable Pain
reactions.text: When the baernaloth is damaged by another creature, that creature must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Portal Sense
traits.text: The bariaur can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each one. The bariaur knows the distance and direction to the last portal it used as long as they're on the same plane.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The bariaur makes two Barbed Javelin or Shortbow attacks.

actions.name: Barbed Javelin
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the bariaur's next turn.

actions.name: Ram
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the bariaur moved at least 20 feet straight toward the target immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage if the target doesn't have all its hit points.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The bariaur casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:
At will: dancing lights, druidcraft
1/day: goodberry, pass without trace, tongues

bonus_actions.name: Mighty Leap
bonus_actions.text: The bariaur jumps a distance up to its walking speed.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The void soother makes two Mace or Void Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Mace
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

actions.name: Void Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +4 to hit to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The void soother casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):
At will: guidance, light
1/day: calm emotions, lesser restoration, remove curse, protection from energy

bonus_actions.name: Soothing Word (3/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The void soother speaks a magical word of mercy, healing one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target regains 4 (1d4 + 2) hit points.

traits.name: Shared Telepathy
traits.text: Any creature touching the cranium rat can use the rat's telepathy if the rat allows it. If the creature knows any language, the creature can use the telepathy to communicate words and emotions.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.text: The cranium rat is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to divination spells.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.text: The cranium rat sheds dim light from its exposed brain in a 5-foot radius or extinguishes the light.

name: Cranium Rat Squeaker Swarm
immunity: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

traits.name: Psychic Messenger
traits.text: The swarm can use its sending spell to target someone familiar to a creature in telepathic contact with the swarm.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.text: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as to divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer, plus 22 (5d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The swarm casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: command *, detect thoughts *, sending *
1/day: confusion *, dominate monster *

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.text: The swarm sheds dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increases the illumination to bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius, or extinguishes the light.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The cuprilach makes three Burnished Blade or Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Burnished Blade
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) psychic damage.

actions.name: Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The cuprilach casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: detect magic, disguise self
1/day: alter self, fog cloud, silence

bonus_actions.name: Assassin's Agility
bonus_actions.text: The cuprilach takes the Dash or Disengage action, or it makes one Burnished Blade attack.

reactions.name: Uncanny Dodge
reactions.text: The cuprilach halves the damage it takes from an attack that hits it, provided it can see the attacker.

name: Dabus
languages: understands all languages but can't speak; communicates via Symbol Speech

traits.name: Physical Restraint
traits.text: The dabus doesn't make melee attacks or opportunity attacks, even in self-defense.

traits.name: Symbol Speech
traits.text: A dabus communicates by creating illusory symbols and pictures that float in the air in front of itself and disappear a few seconds later. A creature that can see such a message can decipher it with a successful DC 10 Intelligence (Investigation skill) check (no action required).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dabus makes two Flying Brick attacks.

actions.name: Flying Brick
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit to hit, range 90 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grasping Ground (Recharge)
actions.text: The dabus causes a 20-foot-square area of ground it can see within 60 feet of itself to sprout clutching appendages made of stone. Each creature of the dabus's choice in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and have the grappled condition (escape DC 13). While grappled in this way, the creature has the restrained condition. The appendages vanish after 1 minute or if the dabus's concentration ends (as if concentration on a spell).

traits.name: Shadowy Form
traits.text: While the darkweaver is in dim light or darkness, attack rolls against it are made with disadvantage unless the darkweaver has the incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The darkweaver can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
traits.text: The darkweaver takes 10 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The darkweaver makes two Shadow Web attacks and one Bite attack. It can use Reel after any of these attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 17 (5d6) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Shadow Web
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 120 ft., one creature. 16 (3d10) necrotic damage, and the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 15). The shadow web can be attacked and destroyed (AC 16; 20 hit points; vulnerability to radiant damage; immunity to bludgeoning, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage). The darkweaver can grapple up to six creatures at a time using its shadow web.

actions.name: Reel
actions.text: The darkweaver pulls each creature it has grappled up to 60 feet toward itself.

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.text: The decaton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
traits.text: The decaton has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.text: If the decaton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The decaton makes three Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the decaton can't use this tentacle against other targets. The decaton has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Lightning Rays (Recharge)
actions.text: The decaton unleashes a barrage of lightning bolts from its eyes. Each creature within 30 feet of the decaton must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 (7d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The decaton casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: detect magic, dispel magic, mending (as an action)
1/day: plane shift (self only), protection from evil and good

traits.name: Aura of Doom
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the doom lord must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the doom lord doesn't have the incapacitated condition, it can suppress or resume this aura at the start of its turn (no action required).

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The doom lord deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The doom lord makes two Entropic Greatsword or Entropic Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Entropic Greatsword
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash.

actions.name: Entropic Javelin
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The rot blade makes two Entropic Blade or Entropic Javelin attacks.

actions.name: Entropic Blade
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash. The rot blade can cause the blade to emit a burst of entropic magic in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the weapon. Each creature in that area other than the rot blade must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 6 (1d12) necrotic damage. The blade can emit entropic magic in this way only once per turn.

actions.name: Entropic Javelin
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this attack has its body and everything it is wearing or carrying, except for magic items, reduced to ash.

traits.name: Brains Devoured
traits.text: When the eater of knowledge is first encountered, roll 1d10 to determine the number of brains it has already consumed.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The eater of knowledge has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The eater of knowledge makes two Slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same creature and the target is Large or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or have the stunned condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one Humanoid with the incapacitated condition. 45 (10d8) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the eater of knowledge kills the target by extracting and consuming its brain.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The eater of knowledge casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15). It must have consumed the requisite number of brains to cast the spell, as indicated:
1/day: plane shift (self only, 0 brains), detect magic (1 brain), silent image (2 brains), invisibility (3 brains), hypnotic pattern (4 brains), major image (5 brains), telekinesis (6 brains), arcane eye (7 brains), mislead (8 brains), greater invisibility (9 brains), mass suggestion (10 or more brains)

traits.name: Headfirst Charge
traits.text: If the equinal moves at least 30 feet in a straight line toward a creature and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or take 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage and have the prone condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The equinal makes two Fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Shout (Recharge)
actions.text: The equinal lets out a booming shout. Each creature within 30 feet of the equinal must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition until the end of the equinal's next turn.

traits.name: Boundless Movement
traits.text: The farastu ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The farastu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The farastu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The farastu makes two Claw attacks and one Bite attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 15, with disadvantage). The farastu has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit (with advantage against a creature the farastu is grappling), reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 24 (7d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Summon Demodand (1/Day)
actions.text: The farastu has a 40 percent chance of summoning 1 farastu demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the farastu, acts as an ally of the farastu, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the farastu dies, or until the farastu dismisses it as an action.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The farastu casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:
At will: invisibility (self only)
1/day: dispel magic, fog cloud

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The shaker makes two Golden Rod or Radiant Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Golden Rod
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The shaker casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: mage armor, mage hand
1/day: enlarge/reduce, fly, suggestion

bonus_actions.name: Commanding Words
bonus_actions.text:
The shaker speaks magical words to order a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d4):
1-2: Grovel:
The target takes 14 (4d6) psychic damage, drops whatever it is holding, and has the prone condition.
3-4: Cower:
The target takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage and has the frightened condition until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Bladed Edges
traits.text: A creature takes 10 (3d6) slashing damage if it starts its turn grappling or being grappled by the ferrumach.

traits.name: Skewering Charge
traits.text: If the ferrumach moves at least 20 feet in a straight line toward a Large or smaller creature and ends within 5 feet of it, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the grappled condition (escape DC 18) and take 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ferrumach makes three Sharpened Limb or Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Sharpened Limb
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The ferrumach casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: detect magic
1/day: dispel magic, ice storm

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The law bender makes three Arcane Burst attacks and uses Power of Authority or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Power of Authority
actions.text: The law bender targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage and have the incapacitated condition for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the incapacitated condition on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this law bender's Power of Authority for 24 hours.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The law bender casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:
At will: dispel magic, fly, mage armor, mage hand, prestidigitation

bonus_actions.name: Spatial Loophole
bonus_actions.text: The law bender teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Probability Loophole (3/Day)
reactions.text: When the law bender or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the law bender can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.text: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Psychic Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +7 to hit to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 21 (4d8 + 3) psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: dispel magic, levitate (self only), mage hand (the hand is invisible), see invisibility
1/day: plane shift (self only), scrying (as an action), slow, telekinesis

reactions.name: Future Insight (3/Day)
reactions.text: When the githzerai or a creature it can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, the githzerai can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.text: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
1/day: jump, plane shift (self only), see invisibility

bonus_actions.name: Matter Manipulation (Recharge 4)
bonus_actions.text:
The githzerai manipulates the energy of the plane of existence it's on to produce one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):
1-2: Astral Step:
The githzerai can teleport, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. In addition, its walking speed increases to 40 feet until the start of its next turn.
3-4: Growth:
Flowers and vines grow around the githzerai until the start of its next turn, then vanish; the ground within 15 feet of the githzerai is difficult terrain for other creatures while the flowers and vines are present.
5-6: Retaliating Light:
Multicolored lights surround the githzerai until the start of its next turn. For the effect's duration, whenever a creature within 5 feet of the githzerai hits it with a melee attack roll, that creature takes 3 (1d6) force damage, as magic lashes out in retribution.

traits.name: Psychic Defense
traits.text: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The githzerai makes three Unarmed Strike or Psychic Bolt attacks. It can replace any of these attacks with one use of its Pacifying Touch.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Psychic Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +6 to hit to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. 17 (5d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Pacifying Touch
actions.text: The githzerai touches one creature it can see within 5 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw, or the githzerai chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, or Dash. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to this githzerai's Pacifying Touch for 24 hours.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The githzerai casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible), see invisibility
1/day: plane shift (self only), telekinesis

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fire starter makes two Havoc Hammer or Havoc Flask attacks.

actions.name: Havoc Hammer
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) fire damage. If the target is a creature, magical flames cling to it, causing it to take 3 (1d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. Immediately after taking this damage on its turn, the target can make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

actions.name: Havoc Flask
actions.text:
Ranged Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. 13 (2d12) fire damage. If the target is a creature, magical flames cling to it, causing it to take 3 (1d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. Immediately after taking this damage on its turn, the target can make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.
After the fire starter throws the flask, roll a d6; on a 3 or lower, the fire starter has no more flasks to throw.

traits.name: Aura of Command
traits.text: Allies within 30 feet of the captain are immune to the charmed and frightened conditions. This aura is suppressed while the captain has the incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The captain makes three Harmonium Blade attacks. The captain can also use Dictate if available.

actions.name: Harmonium Blade
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Dictate (Recharge 5)
actions.text:
The captain verbally commands up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of itself. This magical command must be to undertake an action or to refrain from taking actions (for example, "Throw down your weapons").
A target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or have the charmed condition for 1 minute, during which time it follows the captain's command. The effect ends early if the target takes damage or if it successfully completes the command. A target automatically succeeds on its saving throw if the command is directly harmful to itself, such as commanding it to walk into fire.
A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The peacekeeper has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the peacekeeper's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.

actions.name: Electrified Mancatcher
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until the grappled condition ends, the target has the restrained condition and can't teleport, the peacekeeper can't make Electrified Mancatcher attacks, and the target takes 8 (1d10 + 3) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The remnant makes two Necrotic Surge attacks.

actions.name: Necrotic Surge
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The remnant casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: mage armor, mage hand, prestidigitation
1/day: bane, dimension door, web

bonus_actions.name: Phase (2/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The remnant becomes partially incorporeal for as long as it maintains concentration on the effect (as if concentration on a spell). While partially incorporeal, the remnant has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.text: The hexton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
traits.text: The hexton has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.text: If the hexton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.text: If the hexton fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hexton makes one Pincer attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +9 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the hexton can't use this tentacle against other targets. The hexton has six tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The hexton casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: detect magic, dispel magic, mending (as an action)
1/day: plane shift (self only), protection from evil and good

reactions.name: Counter Magic
reactions.text: The hexton attempts to interrupt a creature it can see that is casting a spell. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the spell is 4th level or higher, the hexton makes an Intelligence check (DC 10 + the spell's level). On a success, the spell fails and has no effect.

reactions.name: Lightning Rebuke
reactions.text: When a creature within 120 feet of the hexton damages it, the hexton magically retaliates with an arc of lightning. The creature must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Aura of Menace
traits.text: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The archon makes two Bite attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a Shining Blade attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.

actions.name: Shining Blade (True Form Only)
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:
At will: detect evil and good
1/day: aid, continual flame

bonus_actions.name: Change Shape
bonus_actions.text: The archon magically transforms into any Medium or Large dog or wolf while retaining its game statistics (other than its size and losing its Shining Blade attack). The archon reverts to its true form if reduced to 0 hit points or if it uses a bonus action to do so.

traits.name: Acidic Secretions
traits.text: A creature that touches the kelubar or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage.

traits.name: Boundless Movement
traits.text: The kelubar ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The kelubar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kelubar makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +11 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid
actions.text: The kelubar spits acid in a line 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Summon Demodand (1/Day)
actions.text: The kelubar has a 40 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d2 farastu demodands or 1 kelubar demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the kelubar, acts as an ally of the kelubar, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the kelubar dies, or until the kelubar dismisses it as an action.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The kelubar casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: invisibility (self only)
1/day: dispel magic, scrying (as an action)

bonus_actions.name: Nauseating Fog (Recharge)
bonus_actions.text: The kelubar magically creates a cloud of greenish fog that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 120 feet of itself. The cloud remains for 1 minute or until the kelubar uses this bonus action again. The cloud is heavily obscured and difficult terrain. Any creature that starts its turn in the cloud or enters the cloud for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or have the poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

name: Kolyarut
immunity: poison, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, unconscious

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The kolyarut is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.text: If the kolyarut fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The kolyarut has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kolyarut makes four Unerring Blade attacks.

actions.name: Unerring Blade
actions.text:
Melee Weapon Attack automatic hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 24 force damage plus one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d6):
1-2: Disarm:
The target drops one item it is holding of the kolyarut's choice.
3-4: Imbalance:
The target can't take reactions until the start of the kolyarut's next turn.
5-6: Push:
If the target is Large or smaller, the target is pushed up to 15 feet away from the kolyarut.

actions.name: Edict of Blades (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The kolyarut moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and can make one Unerring Blade attack against each creature it moves past. Whenever it hits a creature with an Unerring Blade attack during this movement, each spell of 5th level or lower on the creature ends, and the creature has the incapacitated condition until the end of the kolyarut's next turn.

actions.name: Plane Shift (3/Day)
actions.text: The kolyarut casts plane shift, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. The kolyarut can cast the spell normally, or it can cast the spell on an unwilling creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. If it uses the latter option, the targeted creature must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or be sent to a teleportation circle in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.text: The kolyarut adds 6 to its AC against one attack roll that would hit it. To do so, the kolyarut must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

name: Lantern Archon
immunity: lightning, radiant, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, prone, restrained

traits.name: Aura of Menace
traits.text: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The archon sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The archon can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it takes 5 (1d10) force damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The archon makes two Radiant Strike attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Teleport.

actions.name: Radiant Strike
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) radiant damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:
At will: detect evil and good
1/day: aid

bonus_actions.name: Shift Radiance
bonus_actions.text: The archon reduces its Illumination to shed only dim light in a 5-foot radius, or it returns the light to full intensity.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The maelephant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The maelephant makes one Barbed Trunk attack and two Glaive attacks.

actions.name: Barbed Trunk
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 13 (2d12) poison damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target has the restrained condition. While it is grappling a creature, the maelephant can't use its barbed trunk to attack other creatures.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mind Poison (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The maelephant expels poisonous gas from its trunk in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 39 (6d12) poison damage and has the poisoned condition. While poisoned in this way, the creature loses all weapon and skill proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and it has disadvantage on Intelligence saving throws. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only and is immune to this maelephant's Mind Poison for 24 hours.

traits.name: Portal Sense
traits.text: The bloodhound can sense the presence of portals within 30 feet of itself, including inactive portals, and instinctively knows the destination of each portal.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The bloodhound makes three Clawed Gauntlet attacks.

actions.name: Clawed Gauntlet
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +6 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

bonus_actions.name: Marked for Pursuit (3/Day)
bonus_actions.text: The bloodhound attempts to place a magical mark on a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or become cursed for 24 hours. A creature missing any of its hit points has disadvantage on this saving throw. While cursed in this way, the bloodhound can sense the direction and distance to the target as long as the two are on the same plane of existence. If the target isn't on the same plane, the bloodhound knows what plane the target is on.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The matter smith makes two Manifested Force attacks.

actions.name: Manifested Force
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The matter smith casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:
At will: mage armor, mage hand, prestidigitation
1/day: create food and water, fabricate (as an action)

bonus_actions.name: Planar Smithing
bonus_actions.text:
The matter smith magically manipulates the energy of the plane of existence it's on to produce one of the following effects (choose one or roll a d4):
1-2: Chains:
The matter smith creates spectral bindings around a creature it can see within 30 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or have the restrained condition until the end of its next turn.
3-4: Magic Shield:
The matter smith conjures a floating, spectral shield that grants the matter smith a +5 bonus to its AC until the shield disappears at the start of the matter smith's next turn. The first time a creature misses a melee attack roll against the matter smith while the shield is conjured, that creature takes 7 (2d6) force damage.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The musteval makes two Bone Blade attacks.

actions.name: Bone Blade
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The musteval casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability:
At will: dancing lights
1/day: disguise self, invisibility

reactions.name: Skirmish Movement
reactions.text: When a creature ends its turn within 5 feet of the musteval, the musteval can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.text: The nonaton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
traits.text: The nonaton has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.text: If the nonaton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The nonaton makes three Arm attacks and uses Pillar of Truth or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Arm
