actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the nonaton can't use this arm against other targets. The nonaton has nine arms, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Pillar of Truth
actions.text: The nonaton chooses a point on the ground that it can see within 60 feet of itself. A 60-foot-tall, 20-foot-radius cylinder of magical force rises from that point. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 21 (6d6) force damage, and the creature reverts to its original form (if it's in a different form) and can't assume a different form until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The nonaton casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: detect magic, dispel magic, mending (as an action)
1/day: plane shift (self only), protection from evil and good

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.text: The octon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
traits.text: The octon has advantage on initiative checks.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.text: If the octon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The octon makes three Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind of Tentacles (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The octon rapidly extends and spins its ring of tentacles. Each creature within 20 feet of the octon must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward the octon. Then, the octon makes two Tentacle attacks against each creature within 10 feet of itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The octon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: detect magic, dispel magic, mending (as an action)
1/day: plane shift (self only), protection from evil and good

name: Planar Incarnate
immunity: necrotic, poison, radiant, {'immune': ['bludgeoning', 'piercing', 'slashing'], 'note': 'from nonmagical attacks', 'cond': True}, charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained, stunned, unconscious

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the incarnate fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The incarnate has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Planar Form
traits.text: An incarnate on the Upper Planes is a Celestial. An incarnate on the Lower Planes is a Fiend.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The incarnate deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The incarnate makes two Slam or Energy Bolt attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +15 to hit to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 27 (3d12 + 8) force damage.

actions.name: Energy Bolt
actions.text: Ranged Spell Attack +12 to hit to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 32 (5d12) necrotic damage if the incarnate is a Fiend or radiant damage if the incarnate is a Celestial.

actions.name: Planar Exhalation (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The incarnate exhales concentrated energy native to its plane in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 23 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) necrotic damage if the incarnate is a Fiend or radiant damage if the incarnate is a Celestial, and the creature has the blinded condition until the end of the incarnate's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

reactions.name: Searing Gaze
reactions.text: In response to being hit by an attack roll, the incarnate turns its magical gaze toward one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself and commands it to combust. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or take 16 (3d10) fire damage.

reactions.name: Teleport
reactions.text: Immediately after a creature the incarnate sees ends its turn, the incarnate teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

name: Razorvine Blight
senses: Blindsight 60 ft. (can't see beyond this radius)

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: If the blight is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. If a creature hasn't observed the blight move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation skill) check to discern that the blight is animate.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The blight can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The blight makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit (with advantage if the target is missing any of its hit points), reach 10 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Life-Draining Vines (Recharge)
actions.text: Snaking vines erupt from the blight. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) slashing damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If at least one of the creatures that failed this save isn't a Construct or an Undead, the blight regains 9 hit points.

traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
traits.text: The septon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
traits.text: The septon has advantage on initiative checks.

traits.name: Disintegration
traits.text: If the septon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The septon makes four Tentacle attacks and uses Lightning Network or Spellcasting.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the septon can't use this tentacle against other targets. The septon has seven tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Lightning Network
actions.text: The septon conjures a field of electricity that fills a 30-foot cube originating from itself before dissipating. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 33 (6d10) lightning damage and has the stunned condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The septon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16):
At will: detect magic, dispel magic, mending (as an action)
1/day: plane shift (self only), protection from evil and good, sending

name: Shator Demodand
immunity: acid, poison, charmed, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained
languages: Abyssal, Common, Demodand, Infernal, telepathy 120 ft.

traits.name: Boundless Movement
traits.text: The shator ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed. It can spend 5 feet of movement to automatically remove the grappled condition from itself.

traits.name: Jailer (1/Day)
traits.text: The shator can cast the imprisonment spell, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (chaining effect only; spell save DC 18).

traits.name: Liquefaction Ritual
traits.text: The shator can perform a 1-minute ritual that turns all willing farastus and kelubars of its choice within 60 feet of itself into a living liquid form. Each liquefied demodand becomes enough liquid to fill a flask. A demodand's liquefaction lasts until a shator uses an action to end it or a creature opens a container holding the liquid. While liquefied in this way, a demodand has the paralyzed condition despite any immunity to that condition, it has immunity to all damage, and any curse affecting it is suspended.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The shator has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Numbing Secretions
traits.text: A creature that touches the shator or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls and its speed halved until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The shator makes one Bite attack and two Enervating Trident attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (3d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 26 (4d12) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or have the paralyzed condition until the start of the shator's next turn.

actions.name: Enervating Trident
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +12 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Inhibitory Spray (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The shator exhales a spray of slime in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 40 (9d8) acid damage and has the paralyzed condition for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Summon Demodand (1/Day)
actions.text: The shator has a 50 percent chance of summoning its choice of 1d4 farastu demodands, 1d2 kelubar demodands, or 1 shator demodand. A summoned demodand appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the shator, acts as an ally of the shator, and can't summon other demodands. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the shator dies, or until the shator dismisses it as an action.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The shator casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit to hit with spell attacks):
At will: invisibility (self only), suggestion
1/day: dispel magic, plane shift (to Carceri only), scrying (as an action)

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.text: If Shemeshka fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Shemeshka has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Shemeshka carries a magic crown called the Razorvine Tiara. In the hands of anyone other than Shemeshka, the Razorvine Tiara functions as a tentacle rod that deals slashing damage instead of bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Shemeshka uses Arcane Flux or Spellcasting. She then makes one Claw attack or one attack with her Razorvine Tiara.

actions.name: Arcane Flux
actions.text: Shemeshka causes a surge of arcane energy to burst around one creature she can see within 120 feet of herself. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 45 (7d12) force damage and has the incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Razorvine Tiara
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +10 to hit to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 10 (3d6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, or its speed is halved and it has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
Shemeshka casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):
At will: alter self, darkness, invisibility (self only), mage hand, prestidigitation
2/day: detect thoughts, dimension door, suggestion
1/day: banishment, contact other plane (as an action), mind blank

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.text: Shemeshka teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

reactions.name: Fell Counterspell (3/Day)
reactions.text: Shemeshka utters a magical word to interrupt a creature she can see that is casting a spell. If the spell is 5th level or lower, it fails and has no effect. If the spell is 6th level or higher, Shemeshka makes an Intelligence check (DC 10 + the spell's level). On a success, the spell fails and has no effect. Whatever the spell's level, the caster gains the poisoned condition until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The muse makes two Beguiling Resonance attacks.

actions.name: Beguiling Resonance
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one target. 9 (2d8) psychic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The muse casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: dancing lights
1/day: comprehend languages, hypnotic pattern

bonus_actions.name: Enchanting Presence
bonus_actions.text:
Each creature within 30 feet of the muse must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the charmed condition for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to any muse's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the muse deals damage to the charmed creature, the charmed creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: None
traits.text: None

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Additionally, if the sunfly is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the sunfly's location:

actions.name: Upper Plane
actions.text: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Neutral Plane
actions.text: If the target is concentration on a spell or similar effect, it makes the Constitution saving throw with disadvantage to maintain its concentration.

actions.name: Lower Plane
actions.text: The target's speed is reduced by 5 feet until the end of its next turn.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.text: The sunfly sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet, or it uses a bonus action to extinguish the light.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny Dragonfly. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Stings
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage, or 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. Additionally, if the swarm is on an Outer Plane, it injects the target with a toxin, the effect of which is determined by the swarm's location:

actions.name: Upper Plane
actions.text: The target sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius until the end of its next turn. During that time, the invisible condition has no effect on it.

actions.name: Neutral Plane
actions.text: If the target is concentration on a spell or similar effect, it loses its concentration.

actions.name: Lower Plane
actions.text: The target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Dazzling Lights (Recharge)
actions.text: The swarm shines its lights in a dazzling display. Each creature within 15 feet of the swarm must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the stunned condition for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus_actions.name: Illumination
bonus_actions.text: The swarm sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet, or it uses a bonus action to extinguish the light.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The Dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

actions.name: Time Breath (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The Dragon exhales a wave of shimmering light in a 15-foot cone. Nonmagical objects and vegetation in that area that aren't being worn or carried crumble to dust. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 (6d8) force damage and is magically weakened as it is desynchronized from the time stream. While the creature is in this state, attack rolls against it have advantage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage only. A weakened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Instinctive Reflexes
traits.text: The conduit has advantage on initiative rolls, and it can't have disadvantage on attack rolls.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While the conduit is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The conduit makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text:
Melee Weapon Attack +7 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the conduit can choose one of the following additional effects (up to once per turn each):
Incapacitate:
The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have the incapacitated condition until the end of the conduit's next turn.
Push:
The target is pushed up to 10 feet horizontally away from the conduit.

reactions.name: Deflect Attack
reactions.text: In response to being hit by an attack roll, the conduit partially deflects the blow. The damage the conduit takes from the attack is reduced by 1d10.

reactions.name: Don't Be There
reactions.text: When the conduit must make a saving throw, it can move up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If its new position moves it out of range or otherwise makes it impossible to be targeted by the effect, the conduit avoids the effect entirely.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While the instinct is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The instinct makes three Unarmed Strike attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +5 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

reactions.name: Deflect Blow
reactions.text: In response to being hit by a melee attack roll, the instinct partially deflects the blow. The damage the instinct takes from the attack is reduced by 1d6.

name: Vargouille Reflection
languages: understands Abyssal, Infernal, and any languages it knew before becoming a vargouille, but it can't speak

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The vargouille has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Abyssal Curse
actions.text: The vargouille targets one Humanoid within 5 feet of itself that has the incapacitated condition. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target's Charisma decreases by 1 after each hour, as its head takes on Fiendish aspects, and its Charisma can't increase. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell. When the cursed target's Charisma becomes 2, the target dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille reflection. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete ends the curse and restores the target's Charisma.

actions.name: Horrific Reflection (Recharge 5)
actions.text: The vargouille's head mimics that of a Humanoid the vargouille can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage and have the frightened condition for 1 hour or until the vargouille loses concentration (as if concentration on a spell). If the target's saving throw is successful or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Horrific Reflection of all vargouille reflections for 1 hour.

traits.name: Aura of Menace
traits.text: As long as the archon doesn't have the incapacitated condition, each creature of the archon's choice that starts its turn within 20 feet of the archon must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the frightened condition until the start of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to all archons' Aura of Menace for 24 hours.

traits.name: Eternal Vigil
traits.text: The archon can't be surprised. Moreover, it knows when any creature uses a portal it is assigned to guard.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The archon makes two Claw attacks and one Tracker's Bite attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the target has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). The archon can have only one creature grappled in this way at a time.

actions.name: Tracker's Bite
actions.text: Melee Weapon Attack +8 to hit to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (3d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, for the next 24 hours, the archon knows the distance and direction to the target while they are both on the same plane of existence.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.text: The archon teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 120 feet of itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text:
The archon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
At will: detect evil and good
1/day: aid, continual flame, protection from evil and good, scrying (as an action)
